item.title: Pygame Zero
item.description: Let’s get a simple game happening, a bit at a time, so you can see how you might go about it yourself. All of these examples are complete programs, so make sure you copy them into Mu (or whatever editor you’re using) and run them as you go through this page. Screen size Let’s start by setting the size of the screen. 1 2 3 4 5 6 import pgzrun WIDTH = 800 HEIGHT = 600 pgzrun.
